Source.Name: kdegames
Source.Description: Contains various logic, strategy, card, board and arcade games that ship with KDE4.

Package.Name: kdegames-common
Package.Description: KDEGames-Common contains common files that using by KDE based games.

Package.Name: kdegames-devel
Package.Description: KDEGames-Devel contains header files for devoloping KDE based games.

Package.Name: bomber
Package.Description: Bomber is a single player arcade game. The player is invading various cities in a plane that is decreasing in height.

Package.Name: bovo
Package.Summary: Five in a row board game
Package.Description: Bovo is a Gomoku like game for two players, where the opponents alternate in placing their respective pictogram on the game board.

Package.Name: kapman
Package.Description: Kapman is a clone of the well known game Pac-Man. You must go through the levels escaping ghosts in a maze. You lose a life when a ghost eats you, but you can eat the ghosts for a few seconds when eating an energizer.

Package.Name: katomic
Package.Description: KAtomic is both fun and educational game built around molecular geometry.

Package.Name: kbattleship
Package.Description: KBattleship is a Battle Ship game for KDE. Ships are placed on a board which represents the sea. Players try to hit each others ships in turns without knowing where they are placed. The first player to destroy all ships wins the game.

Package.Name: kblackbox
Package.Description: KBlackBox is a game of hide and seek played on a grid of boxes. The computer has hidden several balls within this box. By shooting beams into the box and observing where they emerge it is possible to deduce the positions of the hidden balls.

Package.Name: kblocks
Package.Description: KBlocks is the classic falling blocks game. The idea is stack the falling blocks in a way that lines are completely filled. When a line is completed it is removed, and more space is available in the play area. When there is not enough space for blocks to fall, the game is over.

Package.Name: kbounce
Package.Description: KBounce is a single player arcade game with the elements of puzzle. It is played on a field, surrounded by walls, with two or more balls that move about in the field bouncing off of walls. The player can build new walls, decreasing the size of the active field. The goal of the game is to fill at least 75% of the field and advance to the next level.

Package.Name: kbreakout
Package.Description: KBreakout is a Breakout like game. The object of the game is to destroy as many bricks as possible without losing the ball.

Package.Name: kdesnake
Package.Description: KSnake is a simple Snake-like game for the K Desktop Environment. The aim of KSnake is to survive as long as possible and eat as many fruits as you can.

Package.Name: kdiamond
Package.Description: KDiamond is a single player puzzle game. The object of the game is to build lines of three similar diamonds.

Package.Name: kfourinline
Package.Summary: Four in a row board game
Package.Description: KFourInLine is a board game for two players based on the Connect-Four game.

Package.Name: KGoldrunner
Package.Summary: Hunt gold, dodge enemies and solve puzzles
Package.Description: KGoldrunner is an action game where the hero runs through a maze and dodges enemies. You must guide the hero with the mouse or keyboard and collect all the gold nuggets, then you can climb up into the next level. Your enemies are also after the gold. Worse still, they are after you.

Package.Name: killbots
Package.Description: Killbots is a simple game of evading killer robots. Who created the robots and why they have been programmed to destroy, no one knows. All that is known is that the robots are numerous and their sole objective is to destroy you.

Package.Name: kiriki
Package.Description: Kiriki is an addictive and fun dice game for KDE, designed to be played by as many as six players.

Package.Name: kjumpingcube
Package.Description: KJumpingCube is a simple tactical game.

Package.Name: klines
Package.Description: Kolor Lines is a simple but highly addictive, one player game for KDE. Kolor Lines has been inspired by well known game of Color Lines. The goal of Kolor Lines is quite plain. The player has to move the colored balls around the game board, gathering them into the lines of the same color by five.

Package.Name: kmahjongg
Package.Description: KMahjongg is a fun board game created after the famous oriental game of Mahjong. Unlike the original however, KMahjongg is a tile matching game for one or two players, a variation usually known as Mahjong Solitaire.

Package.Name: kmines
Package.Description: KMines is the classic Minesweeper game. The idea is to uncover all the squares without blowing up any mines. When a mine is blown up, the game is over.

Package.Name: knetwalk
Package.Description: KNetWalk is a single player logic game. The object of the game is to start the LAN, connecting all the terminals to the server, in as few turns as possible.

Package.Name: kolf
Package.Description: Kolf is a miniature golf game with 2d top-down view. Courses are dynamic, and up to 10 people can play at once in competition.

Package.Name: kollision
Package.Description: Kollision is ball dodging game. Click on the empty field to start a game: a blue ball immediately replaces your mouse cursor, and a number of red balls start to fade into the field.

Package.Name: konquest
Package.Description: Konquest is the KDE version of Gnu-Lactic. Players conquer other planets by sending ships to them.

Package.Name: kpat
Package.Description: To play KPatience you need, as the name suggests, patience. For simple games, where the way the game goes depends only upon how the cards fall, your patience might be the only thing you need.

Package.Name: kreversi
Package.Description: KReversi is a simple one player strategy game played against the computer.

Package.Name: ksame
Package.Description: SameGame is a simple game. It is played by one player, so there is only one winner. You play for fun and against the high score. It has been inspired by SameGame, which is only really famous on the Macintosh.

Package.Name: kshisen
Package.Description: Shisen-Sho is a solitaire-like game played using the standard set of Mahjong tiles. Unlike Mahjong however, Shisen-Sho has only one layer of scrambled tiles.

Package.Name: ksirk
Package.Description: The goal of the KsirK is simply to conquer the World... It is done by attacking your neighbors with your armies.

Package.Name: ksirkskineditor
Package.Description: Skin editor for the world domination strategy game

Package.Name: kspaceduel
Package.Description: In KSpaceDuel, each of two possible players controls a satellite spaceship orbiting the sun. As the game progresses players have to eliminate opponent's spacecraft. As soon as the opponent's satellite is destroyed, the remaining player wins the round.

Package.Name: ksquares
Package.Summary: Connect the dots to create squares
Package.Description: KSquares is a fun and exciting game that modeled after the well known pen and paper based game of Dots and Boxes.

Package.Name: ksudoku
Package.Description: Ksudoku is a logic-based symbol placement puzzle.

Package.Name: ktron
Package.Description: KTron is a simple Tron-Clone for the K Desktop Environment. You can play KTron against the computer or a friend. The aim of the game is to live longer than your opponent. To do that, avoid running into a wall, your own tail and that of your opponent.

Package.Name: ktuberling
Package.Description: KTuberling a simple constructor game suitable for children and adults alike. The idea of the game is based around a once popular doll making concept.

Package.Name: kubrick
Package.Description: Kubrick is based on the famous Rubik's Cube™ puzzle, invented by Professor Erno Rubik in Hungary in the 1970s.

Package.Name: lskat
Package.Description: Lieutnant Skat is a fun and engaging card game for two players, where the second player is either live opponent, or built in artificial intelligence.

Package.Name: kigo
Package.Description: Kigo is an open-source implementation of the popular Go game. Go is a strategic board game for two players.

Package.Name: klickety
Package.Description: Klickety is a kind of solitary game that takes place on a Tetris-like board.

Package.Name: palapeli
Package.Description: Palapeli is a single-player jigsaw puzzle game. Unlike other games in that genre, you are not limited to aligning pieces on imaginary grids.

Package.Name: granatier
Package.Description: Granatier is a clone of the classic Bomberman game, inspired by the work of the Clanbomber clone.

Package.Name: kajongg
Package.Description: Kajongg is the ancient Chinese board game for 4 players. Kajongg can be used in two different ways: Scoring a manual game where you play as always and use Kajongg for the computation of scores and for bookkeeping.

Update.Comment: Split package to include some games in images.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Stable update to new bugfix release
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan
